channel.title: LF AI RSS
channel.description: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

item.title: Briefing with LLM on Tue, 08 Aug 2023 10:39:53
item.description: The content provided is a mix of news articles and job postings. The topics covered include technology, finance, real estate, and healthcare. Some of the articles discuss recent developments in the tech industry, such as Oladance's successful angel funding round and the launch of Alibaba's new platform. Other articles focus on finance, including the recent drop in A-shares and the increase in the RMB to USD exchange rate. Additionally, there are job postings for software engineers in London and San Francisco, as well as news about healthcare advancements, such as the discovery of a molecular mechanism used by malignant melanoma to evade immune responses.
